entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 60
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 40
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTHEAST AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
